messages.content: What is the purpose of the 'Save Weight As Kolors Unet' node in ComfyUI?

The 'Save Weight As Kolors Unet' node in ComfyUI is used to save the model in Kolors Unet format. This feature is designed to simplify the process of transferring weights to and from different image generating utilities.
How is the 'Save Kolors' feature beneficial for the ComfyUI-Kolors-Utils plugin?

The 'Save Kolors' feature in ComfyUI-Kolors-Utils is vital because it enhances the functionality of the ComfyUI-Kolors-MZ plugin by supporting the save and management of sd format Kolors. This means that the sd format Kolors can now be uploaded to lib and tusiart.com for online generation.
What steps must be taken to install the Comfyui-Kolors-Utils plugin in ComfyUI?

To install the Comfyui-Kolors-Utils plugin, one must open a command prompt within the Comfyui folder and run the commands cd custom_nodes and git clone https://github.com/lrzjason/Comfyui-Kolors-Utils.git.
What can be found in the 'models/unet' directory after using the 'Save Weight As Kolors Unet' node?
After utilizing the 'Save Weight As Kolors Unet' node, the 'models/unet' directory will contain the saved weight in the Kolors Unet format.
